plot: In four different sections, the story of four men who do not know each other but end up crossing each others' path in Curitiba.
title: Curitiba Zero Grau
plot_es: In four different sections, the story of four men who do not know each other but end up crossing each others' path in Curitiba.
plot_en: In four different sections, the story of four men who do not know each other but end up crossing each others' path in Curitiba.
